name: Tree Menders
description:
Tree Menders is a game created for the 188th weeklygamejam. The game is about fixing up broken treehouses and decorating them however you want. Players are scored based on how much of the treehouse they fix, paint and decorate.

The theme for the Game Jam was 'Treehouse'

All the assets and programming was created using Autodesk Maya and Unreal Engine 4.
